body.name: MUSETEX PC CASE ATX 6 PWM ARGB Fans Pre-Installed, Type-C Mid Tower Computer Case with Full View Dual Tempered Glass, Gaming PC Case,Black(K2)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 21 mins
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 21 mins
features: MUSETEX brings you gaming computer case K2,both a visual experience and a first-class installation experience,high configuration,high cost performance. Pc case pre-install 6 PWM ARGB fans,strong cooling performance; Large case installation space; The 270° fully transparent dual tempered glass panel,a wider field of view and better than most of same cases on market,can display users' high-end and cool PC hardware and beloved dolls, and will gain friends' cool admiration!

Tower Case Powerful Space Layout-The internal structure of ATX case is orderly divided by MUSETEX,each installation space is skillfully laid out,due to the powerful hardware compatibility,installation without blocks,players can enjoy the charm of gaming according to their favorite diverse DIY! Compatible with most mainstream hardware in the market,support GPU up to 420mm(16.54"),support CPU cooling height up to 176mm,support top mounting up to 360mm liquid RAD and support PSU up to 238mm(9.37").

Upgrade High Speed IO Panel - MUSETEX PC case is rich in external interfaces to increase the cost, configured with 2 USB 3.0 and TYPE-C high speed interfaces to facilitate the connection of various new standard devices, enjoy higher transfer rates and save waiting time; enjoy the wonderful experience brought by higher power supply. The Reset button and AUDIO interface are fully configured to meet the multi-functional needs of daily office and gaming.

Good heat dissipation/cool effects all want - MUSETEX pre-install 6 adjustable speed ARGB fans in tower case for lighting enthusiasts,through motherboard software control,customize various light modes,colorful and dazzling lights!Fans use anti-vortex blades to ensure proper airflow inside case, use software regulates fans' speed fully,along with stable air intake performance of side fans,achieving better cooling performance than ordinary computer cases, extending the life of the hardware!

Practicality and viewability co-exist - Tower case rectangular structure body does not take up extra space on the desktop, both beautiful and elegant texture. The case consists of two highly translucent tempered glass panels that transmit light naturally, and the tempered glass is tough and not easily damaged, with excellent sound insulation, providing great comfort for office/gaming environments!

Scientific and thoughtful detail design - Innovative air duct design. Side panel apertures, pre-installed 2 side fans to draw air and dissipate heat for the case, cooling PC components and maintaining stable performance. Obsessive detail design, magnetic dust filter at the top of the gaming case and power supply dust filter at the bottom to reduce dust on the PC while maintaining the cooling function.

No risk of purchase - if you have any problems with your case, please feel free to contact us by clicking on "S0ld-by-MUSETEX" and we will do our best to help you!MUSETEX strives to provide the best support for our customers!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MUSETEX Upgrades New Tower PC Case (K2)

MUSETEX 270° FULL VIEW TEMPERED GLASS DESIGN Unlike other case designs,MUSETEX breaks barrier between two pieces of glass,achieve a 270° panoramic view,like a fish tank,to showcase the high-end PC hardware and cool lighting effects inside case. Free to Customize Any Light Color You Wish *Fans support multiple lighting software *Enable motherboard control,sync of multiple ARGB fans *Allow to sync lighting with other PC accessories connected to MOBO for unlimited design of gaming space FAN TO BUY Cool Colorful ARGB Fans Connection Needs Attention Case fans support motherboards with new type 5V3PIN RGB interface. If not have that,don't worry. 1. Only have 12V4PIN interface can buy a RGB converter. 2. No RGB interface can cont@ct us for advices. Converter

ATX Tower Case Powerful Space Layout 1.Mainstream PC parts fully supported 2.Simple, generous exterior design, scientifical internal structure design 3.Constructed of strong,high-density black metal material with matte color scheme Powerful Cooling Capacity Support 1. Supports multiple sizes of cooling fans and liquid radiators 2. ATX case provides fan brackets for fans with wider cutouts, allowing for custom fan placement and flexibility. K2 Computer Case Package Includes K2 Case *1, PWM ARGB Fans *6, Manual *1, Screw accessory*1 (NOT including motherboard, graphics card, power supply, radiator)

Thoughtful Design of Vertical Mount Graphics Cards 1.A better way to show off your high-end,handsome GPU up to 420mm (16.54") long. 2.Note:MUSETEX specifically designed 3 vertically mountable PCI slots to allow space for graphics card cooling. Thoughtfully Design of Multiple Cooling Channels 1.Independent psu space, independent cooling channel. 2.Bottom double bit cooling area,can install the bottom fan blowing directly on GPU,from the bottom up to accelerate cooling energy efficiency. Thoughtfully Design High Quality Dust Filters 1.Top dust filter magnetic sticker design to prevent easy fall,long life. 2.Maintaining normal ventilation,reduce accumulation of dust in the case,effective protection against dust on the computer. Thoughtfully Design Dedicated Air Intake Fans We find optimal air intake channel for users,carefully equipped with 2 anti-blade fans,provide excellent cooling effect & aesthetically pleasing,protect case components,prolong the life of computer!

The Secret of Unified and Cool PC Build The K2 PC case pre-install 6 PWM ARGB fans,high-level coolness.But if you want to install more fans of same model to achieve more uniformity,you can click button to purchase additional fans from us. FAN TO BUY MUSETEX Carefully Match PWM ARGB Fans for You *We pre-installed 6 of them! *Use anti-vortex blades to concentrate airflow to enhance cooling effect *Speed can be adjusted to meet cooling needs *Colorful lights can be created by lighting software FAN TO BUY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and easy to work with
reviews.reviewText: The case is visually pleasing. 4 fans with RGB included was great. Using Armoury to control fan speed and even on turbo is pretty quiet. The headphones and mic jacks work well, and the power button has a nice feel to it. Tons of space for cable management. Customer service even reached out to make sure everything was okay with this case and even actively helped me with a question I had. Excellent case for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW !!!! Maybe the Best Case in its price range !!!!! SO Glad I bought this
reviews.reviewText: This case is so beautiful !!!! Case arrived next day via Prime shipping... In perfect condition...I put a rtx3060 and an ASRock ATX mobo in this and plenty of space... I use a vetroo cpu cooler and there is probably one and a half inches of clearance to the front glass and maybe 6 inches to spare on the gpu... Should fit a 4090 easy. EASY TO BUILD IN !!!! Plenty of access holes to pull wires through and lots of clearance between the rear panel and the body... if you take a little time managing your cables in the back you shouldn't have any issues getting the back closed or smooshing any wires.I think this case would be perfect for a first time builder because there is just so much space in this case to fit stuff and cable management is easy. All the fans and rgb works and was easy to sync...This case is Amazing !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Beginner Case For A Great Price $$$
reviews.reviewText: Although I’m ashamed to admit it took me quite long to assemble everything, I will say that this case and the six included RGB fans are amazing and work great. They run quiet and everything inside the PC is nice and cool. The tempered glass is very durable and looks so good once you peel the satisfying plastic layer off (don’t leave fingerprints!!!).The included screws and manual help with installing and wiring the fans, and the wiring is mostly neat and already tucked away for you, all you have to do is hook it up to your motherboard! I could be biased because I got this case for $38 after using a coupon and a gift card but still for its base price I would hands down buy this again for my next build if I were to switch cases.. but I will probably stick with this one for quite some time because it looks so good.P.S. For those who are new like me and are concerned about compatibility, this case and a few of the other cases from MUSETEX are available to select on pcpartpicker.com and will make the build process so much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice case, but they need to get rid of the fans that use molex power connectors. The case does have adequate ventilation so it will make for a nice build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the listing looks
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on reviews, including the pictures in the reviews. The listing photo makes it look cheap, and while I can find a few minor issues that I wouldn't accept in a high end case, it doesn't look or feel cheap.First, it's study. I half expected a case that would collapse if you lean on it, but I believe the metal frame would take a lot more abuse than anyone should expect tempered glass panels to survive.The front panel comes in a sheet of plastic to protect it from scratches during shipping, while the side panel has protective plastic on both sides. Both are easy to clean, just remember to clean the inside of the panel whenever you open it, so you don't have to look at fingerprints left on the harder to reach side.Cable management could be better, but I found it totally acceptable. You might want to reroute the fan cables, as they're quite messy. I just left them hidden behind the right side panel.I have four SSDs and 2.5" hard drives mounted, just to see how they fit, and have no complaints. It would be nice if you could choose to hide them without extra hardware. The 3.5" hard drive bays are pretty convenient to install, as they're screwless, but cable access could be better.I think the "filters" are rather silly. There's many openings for air to come in unfiltered, and all of the front fans pull air from unfiltered openings and push it into the case. I've checked with tissue paper to see if there's any inward flow of air through the filters, but it's all outward, so the best you can hope for from the filters is that they will catch some dust on the way *out* of your case. (Assuming you don't change the layout of the fans)Speaking of fans, they all work well, and the novelty lights don't look cheap. The music reacting modes are cool, but react to the sound of the fans themselves, which are quiet but not silent. I'm not sure where the sensor is, so maybe if I picked a different mounting location for the control switch, it might react less to fan sounds/vibration.The controls for the novelty lights are different by the button on the case and the remote. If you don't use the remote, you won't have access to all settings, and you have to cycle through all of the handful you can access by the case button. It also doesn't remember your last setting, so you have to set it EVERY time you power it on. The "mode" buttons on the remote will access every setting you can access with the case button. You can also turn the lights off and on, and adjust the fan speed with the remote, including turning them completely off.There are buttons to select a specific color with the remote, but it only shows that color solid without effects. If you want, say, a pulsing red, you can't do that by pushing the red button. You have to cycle through with the "mode" buttons or the case button. It would make more sense if the color buttons cycled through effects for that color. Still, the novelty lighting is cool.I had none of the trouble others here had with unthreaded mounting holes, misaligned holes, or non-working USB or sound interface on the front of the case.I suggest checking those as early as possible while installing your components, so if you have those problems you can stop before you're finished and return the case for another.There's a small gap where you can see between the front USB ports and the case, but not noticable if you're not looking right at it from above.Overall, I'm quite satisfied for the price. Not a five star case compared to everything available, but easily a 5 star at the $80 price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat that!
reviews.reviewText: Cost, quality and design! It's the perfect tower.Only missing is a CD/DVD slot. Not a big deal since you still be able to use a portable USB DVD unit.Comes with all fans with LEDs except the two side smaller fans.Enough space for one HDD or two SSDs beside two locations for SSD right behind the MB on the opposite side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This case is a wire management dream.. so easy to build stunning pc and great quality for the price... love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was looking for the cheapest case but feel like this deserved a review
reviews.reviewText: This wasn't the cheapest case on amazon but it was close. The extra included fans made me go with this purchase.The frame and metal did not feel flimsy, none of the screws or risers stripped out, the 240mm radiator fit perfectly and if you take all 3 top fans out, the screw holes slide quite a bit each way so you can get it fitted exactly how you want it to look. The sub-compartment for the PSU is also very spacious as well, no issue with cable management. I appreciated the extra fans that were included with this case and had no issues with install or setup. I only used M.2's in my setup but I never needed anything more than a small 'phillips' driver for the entire initial setup. Just waiting on my GPU to come in now to top of my build. Thank you Musetex!Would highly recommend.
